H0.text: Which author created the LAPD detective Harry Bosch. Michael Connelly

H1.text: Which author created the LAPD detective Harry Bosch. James Ellroy

H2.text: Which author created the LAPD detective Harry Bosch. T. Jefferson Parker

H3.text: Which author created the LAPD detective Harry Bosch. Roy Lindell

A4.text: Connelly went on to write three more novels about Detective Bosch—The Black Ice (1993), The Concrete Blonde (1994) and The Last Coyote (1995)—before quitting his job as a reporter to write full time.
